sourcesContent:
<template>
  <canvas id="starfield"></canvas>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "MaskCanvas",
  data() {
    return {
      canvas: "",
      stars_count: "",
      stars: [],
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    this.ini();
    this.makeStars();
    let interval = setInterval(function () {
      this.drawStars();
    }, 50); //定时刷新星星数据
    window.onresize = function () {
      ini();
      makeStars();
      interval = setInterval(function () {
        this.ini();
        this.makeStars();
        let interval = setInterval(function () {
          this.drawStars();
        }, 50); //定时刷新星星数据
      }, 50);
    };
  },
  methods: {
    ini() {
      //初始化
      this.canvas = document.getElementById("starfield");
      this.canvas.width = window.innerWidth;
      this.canvas.height = window.innerHeight;
      context = this.canvas.getContext("2d");
      this.stars = Array(); //数组存放随机生成的星星数据（x,y,大小，颜色，速度）
      this.stars_count = 800; //星星数量
      clearInterval(interval);
    },

    makeStars() {
      //随机生成星星数据
      for (var i = 0; i < this.stars_count; i++) {
        let x = Math.random() * this.canvas.offsetWidth;
        let y = Math.random() * this.canvas.offsetHeight;
        let radius = Math.random() * 0.8;
        let color =
          "rgba(" +
          Math.random() * 255 +
          "," +
          Math.random() * 255 +
          "," +
          Math.random() * 255 +
          ",0.8)";
        let speed = Math.random() * 0.5;
        let arr = {
          x: x,
          y: y,
          radius: radius,
          color: color,
          speed: speed,
        }; //（x,y,大小，颜色，速度）
        this.stars.push(arr); //随机生成的星星数据存在这里
      }
    },

    drawStars() {
      //把星星画到画布上
      context.fillStyle = "#0e1729";
      context.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
      for (var i = 0; i < this.stars.length; i++) {
        var x = this.stars[i]["x"] - this.stars[i]["speed"];
        if (x < -2 * stars[i]["radius"]) x = this.canvas.width;
        this.stars[i]["x"] = x;
        var y = this.stars[i]["y"];
        var radius = this.stars[i]["radius"];
        context.beginPath();
        context.arc(x, y, radius * 2, 0, 2 * Math.PI);
        context.fillStyle =
          "rgba(" +
          Math.random() * 255 +
          "," +
          Math.random() * 255 +
          "," +
          Math.random() * 255 +
          ",0.8)";
        context.fill();
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
canvas {
  position: absolute;
  /*设置定位*/
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -6;
  /*使画布基于最低层*/
  background: #0e1729;
  /*画布背景色*/
}
</style>
